title: Dan + Shay In-Studio On Getting Asked to Perform At Bobby’s Wedding  + Bobby’s Mailbag: Do I Tell My Boyfriend I’m Pregnant Before Meeting His Parents?
itunes:title: Dan + Shay In-Studio On Getting Asked to Perform At Bobby’s Wedding  + Bobby’s Mailbag: Do I Tell My Boyfriend I’m Pregnant Before Meeting His Parents?
description:
Dan + Shay stop by the studio to talk about their new album, getting to perform live again and what it was like performing at Bobby’s wedding and the person they were star struck by the most there. Bobby reads an email from a listener who is about to meet her boyfriend’s parents for the first time…but also just found out she’s pregnant. Should she tell him now or wait?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
